description.value:
School transmutation; Level alchemist 5, druid 7, occultist 5, psychic 7, sorcerer/wizard 7, witch 7; Bloodline Imperious 7;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S

Range personal
Targets you
Duration 24 hours

Description

This spell functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.w8v617tw8wjlcl53]{lesser age resistance}, except you ignore all Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution penalties gained from middle age, old age, and venerable age.

data.shortDescription: This spell functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.w8v617tw8wjlcl53]{lesser age resistance}, except you ignore all Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution penalties gained from middle age, old age, and venerable age.
